block.plushables.basket.tooltip.line_1: §6手持物品时交互：§7将手持的玩偶放到篮子里§r
block.plushables.basket.tooltip.line_2: §6空手潜行交互：§7从篮子里取出玩偶§r
block.plushables.basket.tooltip.line_3: §6左键点击：§7从篮子里取出所有玩偶§r

item.plushables.codex.name: §c毛§6§e绒§a§b玩§9§5偶§c§6§e §c法§6§e典§a§b
item.plushables.codex.landing_text: Your one-stop shop for every plushable under the sun!$(br2)Left click to view pages.$(br)Right click to go back a page.$(br)Scroll wheel down/up to turn pages.$(br2)If you have an item/recipe viewer mod installed such as EMI or REI, you can find all Plushables recipes there too.

plushables.midnightconfig.title: Configure §cP§6l§eu§as§bh§9a§5b§cl§6e§es§r
plushables.midnightconfig.betaWarning:
§6The following features are in beta:§r
This means they have been tested and are generally safe to use.
If using this mod on a large server it's advised that beta features are disabled.
plushables.midnightconfig.experimentalWa:
§cThe following features are experimental:§r
All features here have the potential to cause either a headache or potentially irreversible damage to your world.
Please be cautious and enable them at your own risk.
plushables.midnightconfig.allow_all_bloc: Allow all blocks to be placed in baskets §7[Potentially dangerous depending on what block is placed in basket]§r
resourcePack.plushables.bovinesandbutter: Use Bovines and Buttercups' Moobloom style for plushies
